item.title: That Tricky Thing Called Automation
item.description: Automation of processes is something every serious organization should look into. The other option is to waste your precious human resources on tasks that are repetitive and hardly challenging. That is a depreciation in both man-hours and the employee morale. No one wants to keep on doing the same thing over and over again, especially if the tasks do not require the proper use of the human intellect. Automation enables the machine driven initiation and management of these tasks and sometimes can even help coordinate the use of manual intervention.
